title: RCX Orbit JSON (v1)
description: Schema for rcx.orbit.v1 orbit export. Additive fields may be added in future versions; consumers should ignore unknown fields.

max_steps.description: Requested max rewrite steps (seed is included in states as i=0).

states.description: Orbit states including seed at i=0.

provenance.description: Optional per-step provenance for rewrite transitions. One entry per successful rewrite step (i = 1..).

i.description: Step index in the orbit sequence (seed is i=0, first rewrite produces i=1).

rule_i.description: 0-based index into program.rules for the rule that fired.

pattern.description: Matched rule pattern (Mu serialized as text).

template.description: Rewrite template that fired (Mu serialized as text).

bindings.description: Optional environment bindings captured during pattern match. Keys are variable names; values are Mu serialized as text.
